A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: You may notice a curious\, common writing style among all of the positive reviews on here. I’m not saying they’re phony but I’m also not saying the writers or the director have any idea how to make an interesting movie. It had a few bright spots between Rey and Ren but for the most part\, all the hype and fan theory debates were FAR more exciting and interesting than what was delivered. Dud.
